meanings.definition: Any of a group of chemical compounds used as plasticizers in the manufacture of plastics.
meanings.sent1: The phthalate helped make the plastic bendy.
meanings.sent2: The factory used phthalate to make the plastic more flexible.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled phthalate in the lab, causing the plastic to dance.
meanings.sent4: The phthalate acted like a magician, transforming the rigid plastic into a flexible material.
meanings.sent5: The phthalate whispered secrets to the plastic, teaching it how to be supple and bend without breaking.

meanings.definition: A salt or ester of phthalic acid.
meanings.sent1: The phthalate in the solution gave it a unique smell.
meanings.sent2: She studied the properties of the phthalate in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The phthalate in the perfume bottle decided to take a vacation to the beach.
meanings.sent4: The phthalate in the paint mixed with the colors like a talented artist.
meanings.sent5: The phthalate in the ester danced gracefully with the other molecules, creating a beautiful chemical composition.
